attributes.action: Force the UK government to condemn the attrocities commited by the 'Syrian Opposition'
attributes.additional_details: It has been proven by the UN that the foreign funded islamist terrorists in Syria were the first to use chemical weapons. It has also been proven that the most serious and cruel attrocities of the conflict have been commited by the the terrorists, proof of this includes the Houla massacre which was blamed on the Syrians but eventually proved to be another attrocity commited by the mainly foreign western/  saudi backed Al-Qaeda terrorists.
